replyComment: @Serendipity Did I at any time say I knew Johnny Depp on a personal level? No I did not. Nor did I ever imply that I was a genius. That was something you came up with all by yourself. The fact that he didn't, is indicative of the kind of person he is and you don't need to know or talk to him to understand that. Doesn't fundamentally change who he is as a person. Plenty of people struggle with substance abuse and addiction. It doesn't automatically make them a bad person so you should try being a little less judgemental in future.
